turns.utterance: Southern fried chicken is my favorite!
I love mine crispy and well seasoned. Also, take out the excess fat and you have the perfect recipe.
Your doing it wrong my fiend. Deep fried is the way to go. It's how the West African people used to do it back then.
turns.response: I will try deep fried next time I eat chicken.

turns.utterance: You definitely should because now it's so easy to get. Prior to the second world war it was very expensive.
turns.response: How long do I cook them for?

phrase: your doing it wrong my friend.
your doing it wrong my fiend.

annotation.comment: in the users opinion, the system does not know how to do grilled chicken
